about:
I am a Software Engineer with 12+ years of Clinical and Research Histology experience.
  My education and transferable skills allow me to be an adaptable and unique addition to the Software Engineering Field.

I love taking on new challenges and appreciate the growth along the way.  Software Engineering has allowed me to continue researching, building upon, and increasing my technology knowledge base.

When I am away from the screen, I can be found outside running, hiking, camping and fishing in beautiful Colorado!
